ShortDescription.Value: Prevents vehicle traffic despawn in pathing deadlocks; configurable

Publish.LongDescription:
This mod controls whether vehicles and pedestrians are despawned based on stuck/deadlock detection.
*New*: Despawning can now be turned on/off for specific object types in the settings menu.
* The configuration allows granularly configuring the parameters used by the game to decide if a vehicle's pathing conflict is unrecoverable; the base game is overly aggressive. * The recommended settings for this mod are to enable despawn for explicit deadlock detection only. * There is also an option to highlight objects that have been detected as stuck/deadlocked to visualize the bottlenecks in the city's traffic, add a delay timer and rate-limiting to removing stuck objects to increase the chance the simulation resolves the deadlock itself.
